SELECT E.EQM_ID AS EQM_ID, E.EQM_NAME AS EQM_NAME, E.CHCK_PERD ||'일' AS CHCK_PERD, C.CHCK_DT AS CHCK_DT, f_com_code_to_nm(upper(C.JUDT)) AS JUDT, C.CHCK_DETA AS CHCK_DETA, (C.CHCK_DT+E.CHCK_PERD) AS NM_CK_DT, C.INSPR FROM EQM E LEFT OUTER JOIN CHCK C ON (E.EQM_ID = C.EQM_ID)
AND TRUNC(C.CHCK_DT) >= TO_DATE(#{fromCkDate})
AND TRUNC(C.CHCK_DT) <= TO_DATE(#{toCkDate})
OR TRUNC(C.CHCK_DT) IS NULL
order by C.CHCK_DT asc

E.EQM_ID = #{eqmId}
